title: Legendary Skin for Ahri
body: my friend and I were thinking that Ahri should get a new skin because her current ones dont change much about her. After a day of thinking came up with true/false love Ahri(if someone has a better name please say so), so this skin has two sides to it true love and false love, Ahri will be true love throughout the game until she uses an ability then she will turn into false love Ahri for around 5 seconds and during that time if she activates another ability it will reset the timer of false love Ahri. Tell me if you like the idea and would want it in league of legends

replies.body: Kinda cool, not enough detail to know for sure.
Well we only came up with it in a bus trip after around a day of thinking of a name and we couldnt really think of a good name
Name doesn't matter. It's more like the visual details of the skin, colour schemes, ability particles, the lot.
Yeah i guess i really should've thought about that stuff, but i also just wanted to let people know about this idea and maybe have a full group work on it or something
While you do have a very understandable point, I took a look at your'e profile and you seen VERY biased, but I am willing to respect your opinion.
It kind of changes the champion as a whole... so I don't think it will work that well, skins only change looks not gameplay...

No, it doesn't change gameplay in any way that will affect the game itself. You could say the same about Spirit Guard Udyr or DJ Sona. It doesn't affect gameplay in any way more than visually. It's fine and it's cool.
It's kinda meant to represent the good and bad sides that love can hold also i dont see how it would change game play it doesnt give her a buff or anything

It may change gameplay because you are giving the player a chance the change skins and colours from true to false Ahri some people may not know when to use abilities since you are changing her mechanics by adding this kind of skin, and anyway i don't think Riot will put a skin that is so unique.
True, i think riot should step outside the box once in a while though, i mean they stay to the same thing most of the time
Honestly, I feel like Ahri already has enough skins. I mean, Yorick is still crying in the corner.
I know she has alot of skins but the only two in my opinion that looks good is foxfire and popstar, you also need to think that not many people play yoric but quite a bit play ahri
